name: HalalXtreme Grill
address: 13-04 Beach Channel Dr, Queens, NY 11691, USA

reviews.text: Great food
Very good food and very cheap

Found this place while we were visiting Rockaway Beach coming from Toronto, generous portions at a reasonable price but most importantly it's worthy as the taste of fish, chicken and lamb, everything was really good.
good quality and taste
So good
The food was amazing and the service was great
Amazing food , amazing price , customer service amazing , comida buena tudo bueno
Amazing food, got chicken over rice. The place is clean too. Should def go there.
Best taste in town and very nice atmosphere. Definitely recommend.
Food always hits no matter what time and great customer service
Best place in New York
amazing loaded fries best thing onna menu
Foods good
yessssss
Great food and everything is great
Food is very delicious and the brothers are very friendly and kind. I highly recommend if you are in the far rockaway area go check them out
Fast service good food many options cheap price

The food was hot and well seasoned.  The portions were not too big but definitely big enough for you to leave full.
I would definitely recommend this eatery and will return.   The customer service is very good and it is evident that they care about what they do.
Good food
Great food
Amazing food, quick service, friendly, clean, would come back again
Great food
Good service every time
The food is really good, and the loaded fries are amazing
I get this food atleast twice a week best halal in far rockaway
Good food
Fire
Great service and the food was very good. Will recommend to anyone in the area. 5 stars.
Great service great food
This place is great I would eat here again

Food quality has fallen from when they first took over. Owner needs to come back . Everything was fresh and well kept when he was around. Employees don‚Äôt wash their hands at all! Won‚Äôt be buying there anymore until I see the owner return .
Awesome. !!!!!!
Very friendly, polite, patient and helpful workers. Looks clean!
Loved the food and service
Extremely tasty Halal Food. Even better that they have a seating area inside. Very kind and hardworking guys.
Guys are awesome
Nice food, nice people.
Great food ,very helpful and pleasant staff
The food was amazing! I had to order two time because the food was amazingly good my kids liked it too.
The customer service is very good. The restaurant smells very good and clean. Very quiet. The servers are respectful and accommodating.
Consistently high quality whenever I come in. I've never had any bad food here. The Philly cheese steak sub is quite tasty, and the fries and onion rings are excellent.
Food taste amazing Customer service is amazing. I will recommend this restaurant anyday. The food is fresh and they cook it right in front of you Halal extreme is üëèüèΩ Amazing‚Ä¶
Very clean, smells good. Polite people. Eating the food now , taste good. In door seating.
Wow amazing food !! Taste and fresh organic

The food was amazing had it twice so far, the rice and mixed salad is my favorite. The reason why I gave it a two is because this is the second time the same guy has given me attitude/ rude while I have my child with me and I really felt uncomfortable.

They got straight to the point, got my food right and the worker was great overall. As long as the worker does his job I‚Äôm happy and they delivered on their good service. I would recommend it if you want some really good halal food in the area.
Place has great food and the owner is nice comped me a free drink. Recommend the chicken over rice try it out. It's under new management and it shows. Will stop by again

Signs says under new management so I decided to give it another chance and thank good I did Bc it definitely shows in the food. I got the chicken over rice and everything was so good! Even the salad is seasoned to the point I didn‚Äôt even need sauce on it!! The sauces were so good! Highly recommend trying the green sauce!

The mix over rice is my personal favorite. The fresh veggies and the variety of sauce was a plus from the great tasting chicken and lamb. Also, recommend the philly with Mikey sauce. Will def come back to try more out.
food is MAD good over here. hands down best halal in the neighborhood

We usually often give reviews when we are really upset or really delighted. The food here being amazing was a real surprise for me. The increase of halal food establishments and carts, food got poor in quality but this place is doing it correctly !
Have been there for take out 3 times. Very good food. Great service. Very polite staff.
These guys go above and beyond with customer service. On top of that, the restaurant‚Äôs cleanliness is hard to miss. 100/10

Most of the 5 star is because u get free soda with 5 star review, literally the meat in the plate is one spoon, they need hire at least one more employee because you wait long time to order because both of them busy
The food is always fresh at any given time you order live there food worth th buy

my first time ordering I had the hot wings cheese burger and lamb gyro it was soooo good so flavorful very seasoned and fresh !! about time farrock got a good chicken spot. All the other ones kinda trash lol
This was really good tho and the staff very friendly thank you
This place always gives the best quality food they have! My personal favorite is the lamb over rice. Service is always fast and easy with no confusion when ordering!
Under new management! Food tastes great, employees are very friendly. I love stopping by here late after work, worth every penny!
I got 2 chicken over rice and 1 mix over rice with pitta bread. It tasted great. The New Owner gave me a free fried chicken piece with the order plus free soda.
